glsa.title: Pidgin: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in Pidgin, the worst of which allowing for the remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Pidgin is an GTK Instant Messenger client.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Pidgin. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: These vulnerabilities allow for arbitrary file retrieval, Denial of Service and arbitrary code execution with the privileges of the user running Pidgin.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Pidgin users should upgrade to the latest version:
